concept.title: In Case of Emergency
concept.shortdesc: Before you come, please read this page so that you are prepared in case of an emergency.

conbody.p: Both rooms are equipped with fire alarms. Should a fire alarm go off, please walk to the nearest exit. If you are in Room 360, the long staircase in the middle of the building is the quickest way out.
The LED time pieces in each room are also connected to a central system that can relay information. Should there be a campus-wide emergency, pay attention to the time piece for further information.
